0011000001011101 1010110101110011 1 -> sum: 1101110111010001, cout: 0
0101001010000111 0110001110011111 1 -> sum: 1011011000100111, cout: 0
1011001110010010 1110111101111101 0 -> sum: 1010001100001111, cout: 1
0001010101101011 0010101101101001 1 -> sum: 0100000011010101, cout: 0
0000010010101011 0011010100111101 1 -> sum: 0011100111101001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
